Ten grounds on which they split off and: When a mendicant explains what is not the teaching as the teaching
When a mendicant explains what was prescribed by the Realized One as not prescribed by the Realized One
They recite the monastic code autonomously
The evil that lasts for an eon [an10.39:: They burn in hell for an eon
They remain for the eon in a place of loss, in hell
They take a stand against the teaching
They cause schism in a harmonious Saá¹…gha
